overview: Michael Ryan is a busy executive whose fast-paced life comes to a screeching halt one afternoon while jogging. In the blink of an eye, an unexpected heart attack causes two distinctly different aspects of his world to collide as his wife Diane comes face to face with his long term mistress. Now the two women must come to terms with the affair and find common ground in their struggle to accept each other. As Michael slowly recovers he must face the consequences of his actions and ultimately decide who he will choose. But sometimes life has a way of making the decision for usâ€¦
title: Love Always
